Hi,

currently I am struggling with the usage of the QuotaEnforcer. As I un=
derstand, the QE can be used to restrict the download of to many documents =
per host/server.

Currently I am placing the QuotaEnforcer as a bean in the=
 candidateProcessor. But nonetheless the restrictions don't seem to get app=
lied. Currently I am using something like this:

<bean id=3D"candidateProce=
ssors" class=3D"org.archive.modules.CandidateChain">
  <property name=3D"pr=
ocessors">
   <list>
    <!-- apply scoping rules to each individual candid=
ate URI... -->
    <ref bean=3D"candidateScoper"/>
    <!-- ...then prepare=
 those ACCEPTed for enqueuing to frontier. -->
    <ref bean=3D"preparer"/>=


    <bean class=3D"org.archive.crawler.prefetch.QuotaEnforcer">
      <pr=
operty name=3D"hostMaxFetchSuccesses" value=3D"10"/>
    </bean>
   </list>=

  </property>
 </bean>


Are there any examples or any suggestion where I =
should place that enforcer?

Cheers,
Tino
